artist: artist: Andy Baird; artist: Michael Brehm; artist: Robert Corbit; artist: Mike DeVoni; artist: Frank Gaard; artist: Joe Hoppe; artist: Chris Karcher; artist: Mike McCoy; artist: Denise Monaghan; artist: Ann Morgan; artist: Jennifer Sobin; artist: Tim Walton; artist: Jon West; artist: Chris Woodward; publisher: Artpolice, Minneapolis

title: Artpolice, Vol. 16, No.1: "Three Mile Island Tenth Anniversary Issue"
